title: Who's who on the ballot for Philadelphia voters this year?
description: Who exactly is on your ballot, what do they do, and who do they stand for? We summarize everything you need to know.
author: Tori Sousa

title: Penn students flock to early voting, using mail-in ballots and city-run offices
description: In-person early voting began on Sept. 29 and will conclude on Oct. 27, coinciding with the last day to request a mail-in ballot.
author: Elizabeth Meisenzahl

title: Looking to vote in Philadelphia? Here's how to cast your ballot.
description: Your vote is a key part of the county's democracy. It can help shape policy and government to reflect Americaâ€™s diverse population.
author: Pia Singh
